School Programs

With over 15 years of running school programs, Chess Castle Inc. has one of the most diverse and experience staff in New York. Thanks to our depth we are able to provide:

  • Curriculum Classes
  • After School Chess
  • Team Training
  • Early Bird Classes
  • Chess Workshops
  • List of Schools affiliated with Chess Castle:
    • The Mott Hall School
    • PS 39K
